Reviews.Title: Excellent night vision and sharp picture!
Reviews.Author: Kim Lau
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just about a week ago. After I had the existing camera replaced with this one, I immediately ordered one more!I'm not too sure if there would be another camera in this price range (I bought this under $80) have better night vision than this one. One more thing to my surprise is that the picture from this camera would immediately turn into color from black & white during dark as my sensor floodlights turn on (None of my other cameras would do that).Compared to the "Vonnic C104B 1/3-Inch Sony CCD 480 TV Lines 36 IR LED Night Vision 120-Feet" which I also had bought 2 of it a couple of months ago for about a little over $10 less each, I would rather have spend the $10 more go for this camera if I had knew earlier. The Vonnic was also a very good camera,  but this one is really worth to spend the little extra more money.I would highly recommended this camera which provides excellent day and night vision.

Reviews.Title: Deception
Reviews.Author: philippe rendak
Reviews.Content: Review was good, Sony technology, bla bla bla, good price. Not much to lose. So I ordered it. Was a bit surprised by the size. Looks much bigger on the screen and the vendor doesn't provide dimensions... Anyway, I wish I could say it is a nice CCTV camera but it simply didn't work. I had a blurred image once I connected it. There are no instruction so to speak, just a very thin description. Very fussy adjustment are to be made with a finger mouse. That mouse attached to the incoming wire simply didn't respond as if it were broken. It definitely was... I am under the impression that I was sent a defective camera, probably someone had already returned it for the same reason.. because this item would not have passed a Quality Control test.  Anyway, I was refunded without question and they didn't even offer to replace it. As the old saying goes 'you pay for what you get'. The less you pay the more likely you are to run into problems. Too bad it looked promising...

Reviews.Title: Really good specs but reliability problems
Reviews.Author: Mike Hall
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these cameras to replace a low resolution camera.  Notice from the picture that the camera body is close to the mount. With the hood on, the camera is a bit limited in its positiong capabilities.I found the image quality to be good in daylight, and a bit bright and washed out at night.For the price, though, it was pretty good, so I purchased two more. The problem is the IR lights in one of them, and also in a replacement from Amazon, quit working after a few days. Wasn't my cables, since other cameras worked. So out of four copies of this camera, two stopped working. Not willing to try the odds anymore, I stopped buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: KERBY MILLER
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  Great clarity and the night vision was second to none.  Awesome product especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: Workhorse of a camera- built like a tank.
Reviews.Author: hEFF "hEFF"
Reviews.Content: This camera Is above average for the price range in the 700 lines resolution category.FOR THIS PRICE: your getting a camera that has very few artifacts, very little ghosting, very little interference, simple install with BNC connectors,  easy to customize controls and a camera shell casing that can withstand a BB gun being shot at it ( I tried it).  If your expectations is to find a super high quality HD image then this camera is NOT for youIt does not zoom (nor was I expecting it to)  and the night vision is on average with some white outs compared to similar models.  if your buying a camera, what most people care about is the lens quality (its a sony lens low mm)  the internal components (again Sony) (quality construction) and price (value). I can confirm its insides are Sony compnents with a Sony lens. The instructions are the usual instructions from Chinese products (ie. translated english from Chinese)  made to look pretty in a color brochure.I can barely read license plates, but I can see faces. I was not expecting to read plates. The daytime color separation is phenomenal for the price. You do not get a power supply so be sure you buy/use a power supply with the correct amps.  Seller was prompt, shipping was done with high quality foam to prevent damage.ONE minor COMPLAINT: the tool used to adjust the angle of the camera is so tiny and  hard to insert into the camera screw to adjust the angle.

Reviews.Title: Worthwhile investment.
Reviews.Author: Robert Weech
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace a standard camera supplied with the DVR.  The difference in quality is incredible.  I will replace the others with these.

Reviews.Title: Perfect outdoor and indoor
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Jurrens
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these, one was installed almost two stories near the top of the building for an outside view of the entrance.  Other, installed in the hallway where major traffic occurs.  Clear enough picture to make out those coming and going and what they are doing.  Night vision is excellent both indoor and outdoor.

Reviews.Title: GW
Reviews.Author: Jose Eugenio Garavito "GARAVITO"
Reviews.Content: the camera look very thin and small, but it is a great product. will work under rain and cold nights, it is a good CCTV camera .

Reviews.Title: Good price fair picture
Reviews.Author: xtian
Reviews.Content: First, the camera does not come with a power supply.  You will need a 12V 200-350m A.Second, the camera has a ton of features, but you need to hook it up first near the monitor so you can see what you are doing.  Nice vision not too bad.  Daytime view very nice, true colors, and good field of view.Finally, camera is small, compact, and well built.  I have mine mounted under the eave.  Will follow up with picks if I remember.

Reviews.Title: Best deal
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I bought a lot of cameras on amazon that claimed night vision , but this was one that lived up to it's claim.

Reviews.Title: It isn't wide angle
Reviews.Author: Giorgio Ardito
Reviews.Content: camera looks and works pretty good, but be careful with the description title, it says wide angle, and this camera lens is normal.

Reviews.Title: Best camera and price ever.
Reviews.Author: marlene chilin
Reviews.Content: Great camera, I installed it as son as it got delivered to my home,I used it  as a replacement for another camera and it worked perfect.Colors and wide angle viewing are just great.I am buying two more.

Reviews.Title: Used as a replacement
Reviews.Author: R. Leonard
Reviews.Content: This camera has twice the lines of resolution as the camera I replaced it with and the wider view angle was exactly what was needed for the area this camera covered. For the price, I can't complain, its much better than what I had. Comes as camera only, not sure why they show it with controller.

Reviews.Title: Not a good product
Reviews.Author: Jason F.
Reviews.Content: I am now on my fourth one of these. Each one seems to last a week or two and then it goes bad. The company has been excellent at sending me a replacement immediately, but what good does it do when I'm sent another malfunctioning camera? When the cameras are working, the 700 TVL isn't what it's cracked up to be. Picture is grainy and it's hard to identify a person when they are farther away than 20 ft or so.

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: I am on my fourth camera from these guys and I am hoping this one works. The other 3 keep breaking after about a week or two. If this one doesn't work, I will just ask for a refund instead of an exchange. When it does work, the pictures are blurred / grainy. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Will buy again-good quality in this class
Reviews.Author: Sardonic
Reviews.Content: Amazing quality for the price. This is not a 500 dollar unit so don't expect license plate reading at night, but it is heads and shoulders above the other cameras in this class. Great picture, and excellent construction. I still have no clue why they put the control switch so close to the camera, since it stays outside, but I don't care much about that. Price to quality ratio is good. Blows Night Owl, Q-See, Videsecu and the rest of the asian generics away. Easily could be an OEM product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!
Reviews.Author: L. Williams
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these cameras as upgrades from 400 tv line cameras that came as part of a package.  I could instanly see a difference!  The day time view is crisp, clear and vivid.  The night IR view is even clearer!  I liked them so well, I bought 3 more (all Amazon would allow in one order)!It does help to have a mobile phone set up with a viewer when you are setting this camera up.  The control module is close to the camera, so making adjustments can be tricky if you don't.

Reviews.Title: Easy hookup
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: This camera extended the coverage of my driveway and the colors are great.Night vision is as good as I expected.I would recommend this to anyone needing a wide angle view.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Victor Manuel Suarez "OVIEDO"
Reviews.Content: Not to good definition,  the night visión is limited, i does not like  the image quality and 4 4 4

Reviews.Title: Camera exceededd my expectations. Night vision distance and clariety was fantastic. Outdoor view in light great as well...
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: Camera exceeded my expectations. Night vision distance and clarity was fantastic. Outdoor view in light great as well...Here's the ONLY negative, no mounting hardware for pole-mount but that's to be expected. Came with tool as well for base adjustment. Don't know if joystick on cable is weatherproof so had to enclose in weatherproof box as well. Simple thing.

Reviews.Title: Good cameras
Reviews.Author: gwe
Reviews.Content: These cameras, we ordered two, were good. A little tricky to get the B/W and color balanced but it can be done. A very clear picture both in color and B/W. Far better than the 480 line cameras they replaced.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: MC Soulcatcher
Reviews.Content: I've only had these a few days, but no complaints so far.  The price was great for the resolution and image quality.

Reviews.Title: Photo can fool you
Reviews.Author: Frederick Scott
Reviews.Content: The camera picture quality I think is more like 540TVL to 600TVL.  The picture of the camera is a little different from the actual delivered camera.  The camera is much smaller than the picture depicts.  My customer did not care so I kept it and even bought a second one.

Reviews.Title: Theres a lot better cameras out there...
Reviews.Author: Blair LaMere
Reviews.Content: Picture fuzzy (even with all the adjusting you have to do). Night vision is terrible, even with adequate lighting. Camera is a lot smaller than pictured. The mount is flimsy. You get what you pay for/

ProductInfo.Features:
Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor
OSD/NR/BLC/Pict Adjust
Auto Gain Control
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Professional 1/3-Inch Sony Effio CCD 700TVL Outdoor Security Camera - 700 TV Lines, 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens
